name: WP eBay Daily Deals
author: jw

sections.description:
Allows you to insert a listing of the eBay Daily Deals in your sidebar.
If you include an eBay Partner Network campaign ID, you can earn money from traffic you drive to ebay!

A few of the features:

  • Choose how many deals to show
  • Only show a specific deal catagory if you like
  • Allows you to use the eBay Partner Network
  • Choose the logo width to fit your sidebar
  • Hides the affiliate link to ebay
sections.faq:
Why should I contribute or leave the powered by link?

Because you’re a cool person and like to show your appreciation.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • No changes, first released version.

2.0

  • added curl support for simplexml_load_file. Some hosting providers do not allow simplexml_load_file.

2.1

  • Added hard coded image width of 64px. Sometimes the deal pics were very large.

2.2

  • changed display of images so they are inline with text.

2.3

  • minor fixes.

2.4

  • fix for ebay changing rss feed.

short_description: WP eBay Daily Deals - allows you to easily insert eBay Daily Deal listings into your WP sidebar, and earn commission from sales.
